page.title: 14Bus Services In Sidcup.
page.content: The main vehicle on yhe road that you pay to travel on is the bus. There are three different types of buses: red buses, greenline buses and the National buses. { Greenline and National buses}provide transport for long journeys such as up to London or to other parts of the country. {Red buses}provide transport for {short journeys in the local area}and is thus a{more frequent service.}Many children travel by bus to school and buisness men often travel to work on them during the rush hour. This leaves only shoppers or elderly people using the buses during the day. Shoppers provide the bulk of the travellers on Saturdays. The price charged depends on the distance travelled, but passes can be bought for a single week, month or even year.
